DOC.detailed_description: The major aim follow-up high risk group ( < 32 week gestation/ < 1500 birthweight ) control Bavarian Longitudinal Study ( BLS ) age 24-27 year . All probands assess previously , neonatally additional six time point , last time age 12-13 year . The focus identification risk , protective resiliency factor cognitive behavioural development quality life . On basis previously assess data statistical model child development age 8.5 year conduct across total range gestation 26-42 week identify social factor amenable intervention could associate positive development especially moderate prematurity . In addition , cross-validation finding plan mean comparison three international study ( Millenium Cohort , GB ; POPS , NL ; EPICure , GB ) .
